data.name: GRIP: Combat Racing - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Contains 24 drum and bass tunes from the heart-pounding, gravity defining combat racer GRIP. Featuring tracks from Full Kontakt, Whiney, S.P.Y, Royalston and more.

Tracklist
01) S.P.Y. - Midnight Blue
02) Full Kontakt - Clock Watch
03) Silence Groove - Reconnect
04) Whiney - Tailsman
05) Krakota - Citadels
06) Rawtekk - Restless
07) Battery x Makoto - Submerge
08) Royalston - Diorama
09) Krakota x Urbandawn - Coyote
10) Lynx - Clap Track
11) Inja x Pete Cannon - War Games
12) Full Kontakt - The Creeper
13) Full Kontakt - Cyborg
14) Mart-E - Boost Empire
15) Pragmatic - Going Down
16) Full Kontakt - Power Train
17) Revaux - Solidify
18) Whiney - Sunday Grunge
19) Xtigma - Crash City
20) Full Kontakt - Black Out
21) Kevin Greenlee - Main Theme
22) Imperium - Cerbera
23) S.P.Y. - Riding the Void
24) Entita - Can't Wait

data.short_description: Contains 24 drum and bass tunes from the heart-pounding, gravity defining combat racer GRIP. Featuring tracks from Full Kontakt, Whiney, S.P.Y, Royalston and more.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 or Radeon 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970 or Radeon 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.

data.legal_notice: GRIP © 2018 Caged Element Inc. Published by Wired Productions Ltd and developed by Caged Element. GRIP and the GRIP logo are trademarks of Caged Element.  All rights reserved.
